attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cannabis is a social and medicanol used herb. With no hard evidence of bad, long or short term effects, and sufficient good long and short term effects of this substance, I do not see why this is now a class B drug.

Children under the age of 18 are taking this drug and the government are blindly ignoring this. Where the legalisation of this drug would make suffienct change to prohibit children from taking this drug as the black-market would be making no profit through cannabis. The list can go on of reasons..
